title: THE BRITTLE LIMIT: A NOVEL
description: 3-day Free Promotion!An action-packed story of CIA in CambodiaIn bustling Phnom Penh, CIA agent Andrew Shaw starts to piece together the puzzling death of an American man in a remote Cambodian province. As he navigates the town's strange cast of characters, all of whom seem to know something they don't want to tell, Andrew unearths a frightening A local warlord has launched a sinister plot to purge the country of all 'Ch'kais' or foreign vermin. Andrew must journey deep into the jungle to grasp the madness and stop the horror.
author: Kae Bell
